What about some of the list members get together and write some gu=

-- Ron Lederer <ronriko@yahoo. com> wrote:







w=A0=A0 That's=
 exactly what I would do IF I lived near any two of you...(big) =A0BUT I ne=
ed to travel from Mexico...deep in Mexico...and I can't just pop over to me=
et without a firm commitment from others.=A0 So it would have to be organiz=
ed a bit.=A0 I do prefer your idea to a formal workshop.=A0=A0 If that can =
be done...I will be there.=A0 
=A0
By "real researchers" I can only think o=
f the quote "If we knew what we were doing,=A0it wouldn't be called it rese=
arch."=A0 I you aren't afraid to pick up a box and work with it and your at=
titude is as stated above...to me your right in there as a researcher.=A0=
=A0 ron=A0
